mapper.select: SELECT ADDRSIID AS ADDRSIID1, ADDRSINAME AS ADDRSINAME1 FROM ADDR_SI
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_ADDR(ID, USERID, ADDRGUID) VALUES(USER_ADDR_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userId }, #{addrGuId1 })
